Lamb Blvd, ,', 'Las Vegas, NV, 89110', '<URL>', 'Stretch out in your spacious new 2 bed 2 bath apartment at Saratoga Palms.', 'This popular floor plan is now available for as low as $1,300.00 a month.', 'Give us a call or stop by to check out all of the amenities.', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 2 BED 2 BATH', '2 Bedrooms / 2 Bathrooms', '856 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$1,300.00 - $1,325.00', 'Community Amenities', 'BBQ Areas', 'Pool', 'Spa', 'Soothing Spa and Hot Tub', 'Beautiful Landscaping', 'Laundry Facility', 'Picnic Area with Barbecue', 'Covered Parking', 'On-site Maintenance', 'Shimmering Swimming Pool', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets, service and support animals are welcome!', 'We allow pets up to 25 lbs.', 'full grown, max 2 pets per unit.', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'ADA ACCESSIBLE', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
